definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: 1st son of Cush, poet. and late;—Ge 10:7 (P) (LXX Saba, as [[שְׁבָא]]) = 1Ch 1:9 (LXX id., but B Sabat); = nation (or territory) Ps 72:10 (LXX Saba; + [[שְׁבָא]], LXX Arabwn), so (+ [[כּוּשׁ]], ‖[[מִחְרַיִם]]) Is 43:3 (LXX Sohnh); clearly situated in south; most prob. = limh\n Saba/, and Sabai\ po/liv eu)mege/qhv, in Adulic gulf on W. coast of Red Sea; v. Strabo:xvi. 4. 8. 10 Ptol:iv. 7, 7 f. Di:Gn Bae:Psalm Du:Is; > Meroë Jos:Ant. ii. 10, 2 al.
